channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ISIS Created Fake CNN and Al Jazeera Broadcasts
item.description: One video focused on giving ISIS credit for a terror attack that Russian disinformation blamed on Ukraine. “It was essentially fake news to debunk fak...

item.title: Waabi’s genAI promises to do so much more than power self-driving trucks
item.description: For the last two decades, Raquel Urtasun, founder and CEO of autonomous trucking startup Waabi, has been developing AI systems that can reason as a hu...

item.title: My Favorite Affordable Sheets Are Discounted Right Now
item.description: Quince makes some of our favorite cheap-yet-fantastic sheets to sleep on. They’re already a great price—and now they’re on sale.

item.title: EV startup Fisker files for bankruptcy

item.title: I Am Laura Kipnis-Bot, and I Will Make Reading Sexy and Tragic Again
item.description: Margaret Atwood, Marlon James, Lena Dunham, Roxane Gay: We’ve all agreed to be turned into AI reading companions by a mysterious company called Rebind...

item.title: Threads finally launches its API for developers
item.description: Meta said today that it finally launched its much-awaited API for Threads so developers can build experiences around it. This will allow-third party d...

item.title: Crypto Scammers Are Targeting Trump’s MAGA Supporters
item.description: After Donald Trump’s campaign announced it would accept cryptocurrency, the operators of a host of fraudulent websites have sought to hustle his suppo...

item.title: CuspAI raises $30M to create a Gen-AI-driven search engine for new materials
item.description: The company says its platform functions like a search engine for materials, enabling the fast evaluation of a “vast number of novel structures.” © 202...

item.title: Instead of Mining the Deep Sea, Maybe People Should Just Fix Stuff
item.description: A new report contends that deep sea mining is not only an environmental risk, it’s also not going to help meet the world’s renewable energy needs.

item.title: SUSE wants a piece of the AI cake, too
